channel.title: Change item bonus but no item.cfg?
channel.description: I cannot find anything anywhere to change the bonus of my custom items/regular items and im getting sooo frustrated because nobody has this problem listed and... irc chat has no one in there that will help me (noobs) so please help me figure this problem that ive been trying to fix for about 6 hours....(trying to find a tut. Trying to get help in chat)
